name: Forgotten Baggage
description:
You are playing as an Airport employee in the lost objects section, your objective is to give to the travelers the object they lost.

On the right side of the screen, you have the rolling carpet with the baggages on it, drag and drop the baggages to your desk to open them and see if there is the lost object.

You have 2 minutes to provide the maximum objects you can to the travelers.

Controler : Left mouse button.

Game done in solo during the LaTech Game Jam (48h)
